TopicTitle: Make some of the eastereggs movable objects

Articles.Content: Make some of the eastereggs movable objects i.e. make the obolisks have a weight like 1ton or something and make it so that they are objects that can be interacted with i.e. stick a grapple hook on it and move it places, or push them over with a buggy etc.
It'd be great if this allowed us to do some sort of "sample return" mission.
